overview: Nick Bjork was born and raised just outside of Astoria on the Oregon Coast. (Yes, home of the Goonies!) At the age of 18 he moved to Portland in order to pursue a bachelors degree in Communication at Lewis & Clark College. Since graduating he has been vigorously working in the field of journalism while living it up as much as possible here in Portland. He lives just off SE Hawthorne with a childhood friend and his adopted beagle basset hound, Gnarls. He is a self-described foodie who salivates every time he sees a unique deli sandwich or a freshly ground burger. Nick has a strong appreciation for all types of hip-hop, electronic and jazzâ€”basically, anything with a good drum beat. He also enjoys urban fashion, downhill mountain biking, running, old houses, old movies, good books and great beer.
